title: Why do we need to study technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: We need to study technology because we need to gain a deeper understanding of our world. We need to know how we need it in our daily lives and how important it is. We need to study technology to know where the inventions, machines and technology today are based. It is a need to study technology to know what would our life be in the future. Technology is important because it is part of our life. It makes our work faster, can make our lives easier. But it can also harm our lives. We should study technology to know what are the positive and negative effects it can give to us. Without technology there is no progress. That's why we must know what is technology and we must study technology to know what more can it offer to us, how long would it go, and how can we manage the things it can give to us. Also,by understanding technology we can solve some minor issues which are caused in any kind of machine. not to mention,without technology humans cannot progress ,the internet which you are using right now to surf the web is also a part of technology ,which had become our daily need ,the current scenario of human life is that ,we cant live without technology. in past decades,the technology is developing so rapidly.after all, it all depends on us weather to use the technology properly or misuse it .technology progresses each and every second so,by studying technology we should stay updated with it.
